content: 1 ssttrriippeedd bbaabbyy ccaarrddiiggaann by schneckenstrick by schneckenstrick pattern by schneckenstrick reproduce only with permission from schneckenstrick intended for personal use only reproduction distribution or sale of this pattern are prohibited 2 yarn lana grossa solo cashmere 110 120 0 yards 110 0 m /25g 1 skein nr 117 mc taupe and 1 skein nr 109 cc beige need les size 4 3 5mm circular knitting needles 60cm or 80cm and dpn 4 stitc h marker 2 buttons gauge 23m = 4 10 cm in st st adjust needle sizes to obtain correct gauge if neces sary rs k1 m1l k until last st m1r k1 size ws p1 m1l purlwise p until last st m1r purlwise p1 newborn repeat last 2 row in total 8 times = 148 sts finishing co 42 sts with 3 5mm needles and cc change to mc k all sts for 4 row setup-row ws k1 k2tog yo k all sts until last 3 sts yo ssk k1 p3 left f ront pm p8 left sleeve pm p20 back pm p8 k all sts and yo´s right sleeve pm p3 right front k all sts for 3 row and bobble sts on the 4th row 1 row rs k1 m1l *knit until 1 st before m m1r k1 sm k1 m1l* sleeves repeat from * to * in total 4 times and knit until last st now put the sleeve sts 34 sts on double point needles knit m1r k1 all sts pick up 2 sts underarm pm and join round = 36 sts keep changing color every 2 rounds and knit all sts for 3cm 2 row ws on the next round with cc knit as follows p all sts knit until 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk keep knitting with cc and repeat the decrease round after 9cm in now cha nge to mc and continue changing color every 2 total from armhole change to mc and knit as follows row the whole project k all sts repeat ro w 1 and 2 in total 13 times = 172 sts p all sts k all sts on the next rs-row knit as follows k all sts p all sts k1 m1l knit to m rm place sleeve sts on holder rm co k all sts 2sts knit back rm place sleeve sts on holder rm co 2 sts 6th row bobble all stitches purlwise knit unitl last st m1r k1 = 110 sts border purl one row start on the right front bottom of the cardigan and pick up 1 st every row the exact stitch count doesn´t matter here rs k1 m1l k until last st m1r k1 bobble all sts knitwise on the next row ws p all sts repeat last 2 row in total 3 times = 116 sts weave in all yarn tails and sew on 2 buttons by schneckenstrick pattern by schneckenstrick reproduce only with permission from schneckenstrick intended for personal use only reproduction
